21.5. Convolutional Neural Network Models 434
— Window Size Impact in Human Activity Recognition , 2014.
There is some risk that the splitting of the stream of sensor data into windows may result
in windows that miss the transition of one activity to another. As such, it was traditionally
common to split data into windows with an overlap such that the ﬁrst half of the window
contained the observations from the last half of the previous window, in the case of a 50%
overlap.
